project_descr: Strengthening Transparency and Code of Ethics for Enhanced Public Confidence in Court of Cassation (CoC)

outputs.output_descr: Strategies in the Court of Cassation for “disseminating code of ethics”, “strengthening transparency” and “increasing trust in the judiciary” in line with universal values, good practices and lessons learned in other countries.
